x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
Many high school and college students especially from underrepresented or low-income backgrounds struggle to:
Identify suitable career paths based on their interests and strengths Find internships, scholarships, or training programs Navigate complex application processes Connect with mentors or professionals in their field of interest Career counseling resources are often limited, and students miss out on life-changing opportunities simply due to lack of guidance or access.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: YouthPath – AI-Guided Career and Internship Navigator for Students
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

We propose a Career Navigation Platform built on ServiceNow with the following features:

AI-Powered Career Coach (Virtual Agent + GenAI)
Students can chat with an AI agent that suggests potential careers, fields of study, or internships based on their skills, interests, and goals.

Opportunity Matching Engine
Uses student profiles to match them with scholarships, internships, apprenticeships, summer programs, and volunteer work.

Smart Reminders & Application Tracker
Students receive automated alerts for deadlines and track their application statuses in one place.

Mentorship Connection Portal
Connects students with mentors, alumni, or professionals (integrated with LinkedIn or local NGO databases).

Administrative Dashboard
Career counselors and program managers can monitor student activity, identify those needing support, and generate impact reports.

ServiceNow products or capabilities -

Virtual Agent + Generative AI Studio

ServiceNow App Engine (for building student dashboards and workflows)

IntegrationHub (for external data sources like job boards, LinkedIn, or scholarship APIs)

Case Management (for tracking student support requests)

Performance Analytics (to measure outcomes and engagement)

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

APIs for job/internship databases (e.g., Handshake, LinkedIn, or local government job boards)

NLP model trained to understand student language, career paths, and educational terms

User authentication and role-based access for students, mentors, and staff

Integration with student information systems or educational CRMs

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Ensuring the AI provides inclusive, bias-free guidance

Data privacy and compliance with FERPA or similar laws

Sustaining up-to-date opportunity listings through external integrations

Encouraging continuous student engagement with the platform
